While doing performance testing for salesforce application there is one request where salesfroce is sending a lot of parameters to southbound systems around length 7000+. Jmeter is getting hanged when trying to access this request. If somehow managed to access the request the cursor is not going to end. If clicking on enter for next line it is creating space but not from where the current cursor is.

So when replaying the script with small change there is error 500 and without change 402.
